title: Grilled-Trout Spread
summary: Grilled-Trout Spread is a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal condiment. This recipe serves 8 and costs $4.11 per serving. One serving contains 274 calories, 36g of protein, and 13g of fat. 1 person were impressed by this recipe. If you have grilled trout, olives, very onion, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 35 minutes. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 85%. This score is super. Try Smoked Trout Spread, Smoked Trout Spread, and Smoked-Trout Spread for similar recipes.
instructions: Skin the trout and break the fish into large flakes. Transfer the trout to a bowl and add the remaining lemon-caper mayonnaise, chopped olives and red onion; season with salt and pepper. Stir the spread until the fish is broken up but still slightly chunky. Serve with endives, radishes, cucumbers and cauliflower florets.

steps.step: Skin the trout and break the fish into large flakes.

Transfer the trout to a bowl and add the remaining lemon-caper mayonnaise, chopped olives and red onion; season with salt and pepper. Stir the spread until the fish is broken up but still slightly chunky.
Serve with endives, radishes, cucumbers and cauliflower florets.
